content: Rice Cocoons are one of the most common Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong, found often within The Webbed Hollow due to the amount of spider cocoons that are everywhere. They are needed for Chen Loong's quest within The New West.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rice_Cocoons.md', within the main section titled 'Rice Cocoons'.
The content is as follows:
Rice Cocoons are one of the most common Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong, found often within The Webbed Hollow due to the amount of spider cocoons that are everywhere. They are needed for Chen Loong's quest within The New West.
